name: Yasmin Robinson
content:
I had tried a different instructor before and I felt like I was getting absolutely no where! I had no confidence and I didn't know how to do anything! 
Then as soon as I came to Andy I felt like I learned everything in just one lesson! 
Absolutely amazing instructor, very thorough and easy to understand. 
Had a great time learning with him and passed first time! Couldn't have asked for a better instructor!

Thank you Andy!!
